short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to copy all the URLs or refresh all open tabs on Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Copy the URLs from all open the tabs on Google Chrome browser to the clipboard to paste it anywhere.
- Refresh all open tabs on Google Chrome.
